tool_description: Discover the latest news effortlessly with our News API! Access top headlines, explore articles by country or topic and stay informed in no time. Our easy-to-use API provides a seamless way to integrate dynamic news content into your applications. Stay up-to-date with simplicity and ease – that's what our API has to offer!
name: Best News Fetching API
title: Best News Fetching API

api_list.name: Get Topics Name
api_list.description: This endpoint is a utility designed to retrieve a list of available news topics, each associated with a unique topic code. This endpoint assists users in exploring and selecting specific news topics of interest when interacting with other API functionalities.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://best-news-fetching-api.p.rapidapi.com/get_topics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-news-fetching-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Supported Countries
api_list.description: This endpoint serves as a utility to retrieve a list of available countries along with their corresponding country codes. This can be useful for users who want to explore or select a specific country when interacting with other endpoints in the API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://best-news-fetching-api.p.rapidapi.com/get_countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-news-fetching-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get News by Topic
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a convenient way to retrieve top news articles based on a specified topic for a given country.

api_list.name: Get News by Country Name
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves top news articles from the specified country Users may optionally specify the desired maximum number of results, with a default limit of 10. The endpoint processes and formats the raw data before returning a structured JSON response containing news articles details such as titles, summaries, published dates, and publishers.
